# Description

Sophie Sweijen is a research assistant at the [Erasmus SYNC lab](https://erasmus-synclab.nl/) and will start her PhD project in January 2021. Her research focuses on prosocial behavior and societal contributions in adolescence. Currently, Sophie also examines the longitudinal impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on adolescents and university students using daily diary studies.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Sophie Sweijen"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("open source software", "data sharing", "data management", "reproducible analysis", "open access", "preregistration"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
